tool.name: pull_sequences
tool.description: Pulls sequences belonging to specific samples after various stages of preprocessing. Also attaches minimal metadata to seqid for OTU table generation.

param.name: file
param.label: File Containing Samples One Per Line

param.name: plate
param.label: Specify Plate Number for Single Plates (ex: 12.1)

tool.help:
**Description**
Extracts sequences with modified SeqIDs based on a list of samples with metadata for input into the Identification workflow. If no samples are provided, it will simply add appropriate metadata to all SeqIDs.
-----
**Inputs and Outputs**
- Inputs: + Fasta file of all sequences + Groups file mapping each sequence to a sample
- Ouputs: + Fasta file with a specific format: the tool will simply take the sample ID and preprend it to the sequence ID (>MID12_ITS4.ITS4_SEQ1).
-----
**Author**
- Pull Sequences by Sample Script: + pullSeqsbySample.pl + Nan Zhang + Agriculture and Agri-food Canada, Ottawa, ON, Canada
- Pull Sequences by Sample Galaxy Wrapper: + pullSeqsbySample.xml + Nan Zhang + Agriculture and Agri-food Canada, Ottawa, ON, Canada
-----
